fullDescription.intro: Picks diverse rows from an input table based on tanimoto distance between fingerprints. The picking is done using the MaxMin algorithm (Ashton, M. et. al., Quant. Struct.-Act. Relat., 21 (2002), 598-604). The algorithm is quite fast, even for large datasets, but note that runtime increases rapidly with the number of rows to be picked.
fullDescription.option: Number of diverse rows to pick.

ports.outPort: The results of the diversity pick
